divs: Sighting Detailsit was 10:15 10:30 pm eastern time i was sitting on my porch looking out over my street in front of my house there is a small intersection in front of the house and a couple of trees telephone poles etc.. hangin out with my brother and a couple of freinds just talking i notice somthing in the northern direction of the sky it cought my eye becouse of how bright it was i was like wat is that can u see that every one looks this objest was getting brighter and brighter coming towards us and earth it enters the atmosphere and levels off at like 35 40 thousand feet at this point the objest is very bright due to atmosphere entry it stopes and sites there then begines to move slowly it appears to be strguling to get moving again sort of jumping around left to right direction looked like it turned into a blur then it shot off back to the north at the speed of light or faster this thing left a blue streek in its path like somthing from star treck i follwed the blue streek it left until it disappered into a pin head and was gone it was unbeleivable i have watched the sky ever since it was real me and 3 other people saw it ill never forget for the rest of my life i have been made fun of for talking about it , it made me realize that anything u can think of is possible !!!
